fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Destructive: Your Hand Size is 6, and you draw 1 extra card each phase. You are immune to Chaosâ€™ Night phase attack. You may disguise as any role at any point during the game, and this disguise affects up to Susceptible checks. 
- Some Strings Attached: You will know at all times where cards with Strings attached are.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preparations: Gain a Special  card of your choice. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Entangle: Select a player other than yourself. Choose a card they draw in the next phase. It will secretly come with a String attached to it. [Infinite uses, 1 CD, Astral]
- Tug: Steal a card with a String attached, and apply the (Satcheled) modifier to it. Gains a use whenever a player still holds a card with a String attached at the end of a Phase. [0 uses, Recharging, Astral]
- Control: Choose a player that is currently holding a card with a String attached. See their Hand, and play or discard up to 2 cards for them. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Puppet: Choose a player that used a card with a String attached at any point in this game. Next phase, you control all of their card-playing actions. You will see their entire Hand and can make them play any cards they have. They will be unable to trade/use cards at all. [1 use, Unique, Astral]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
